name: Fidelity D & D Bancorp, Inc.
description: Fidelity D & D Bancorp, Inc. is a financial services company based in the United States, primarily engaged in providing a range of banking and financial solutions. Established in 1902, the company operates through its wholly-owned subsidiary, The Fidelity Deposit and Discount Bank, which offers a variety of banking services including personal and commercial banking, mortgage lending, and wealth management solutions. Fidelity D & D Bancorp distinguishes itself through a customer-centric approach, focusing on building strong relationships with its clients and providing tailored financial services to meet their specific needs. The bank is known for its commitment to community engagement and support, actively participating in local initiatives and promoting economic development in the regions it serves. As a publicly traded company, Fidelity D & D Bancorp emphasizes transparency and accountability, ensuring that stakeholders are well informed about the company's performance and strategic direction. In addition to traditional banking services, the company is also involved in investment services, offering clients access to financial planning, retirement solutions, and investment management. With a focus on innovation and technology, Fidelity D & D Bancorp is continually enhancing its digital banking capabilities to provide convenient and secure access to its services, ensuring that clients can manage their finances effectively in an increasingly digital world.

seo.meta_title: Fidelity D & D Bancorp, Inc. | Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Fidelity D & D Bancorp, a community-focused financial institution offering banking and wealth management services. Discover our commitment to customer service and community development.

faq.question: What services does Fidelity D & D Bancorp offer?
faq.answer: Fidelity D & D Bancorp offers personal banking, commercial banking, mortgage lending, and wealth management services.

faq.question: Where is Fidelity D & D Bancorp headquartered?
faq.answer: Fidelity D & D Bancorp is headquartered in Dunmore, Pennsylvania, USA.

faq.question: When was Fidelity D & D Bancorp founded?
faq.answer: Fidelity D & D Bancorp was founded in 1902.
